indicators.description: This tone indicator shows that the text or post is sarcastic and should not be taken as a genuine statement.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is serious and is meant to be taken as such.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is not serious and doesn't need to be taken seriously.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is a joke and not meant to be taken seriously.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is half joking and should not fully be taken seriously but is not just a joke.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is flirting and could be taken as romantic.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is not trying to come across as flirting.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is romantic and has romantic intent.
This tone indicator shows that affection shown in the text or post is alterous. Not necessarily just romantic or platonic.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is platonic and is not meant to be taken as romantic.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is queerplatonic and does not fit under romantic or platonic.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is familial and the users are family.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is with sexual intent.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is not sexual and is not meant to be taken as sexual.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is a lighthearted joke and is not meant to be rude or offensive.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is mostly joking and should not be taken seriously but might have some truth to it.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is joke for the purpose of coping with a situation.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is a joke insult and is not meant to cause offence.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is positive and has positive intent.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is negative and isn't meant to be taken positively.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is neutral and has no positive or negative intent.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is genuine and should be taken as such.
This tone indicator shows that the user is not trying to be rude.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is with playful intent.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is just teasing and isn't meant negatively.
This tone indicator shows that the user is threathening with action. (Sometimes used as a joke, please /j if needed)
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is a copypasta and is not originally written by the user.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is lyrics and part of a song.
This tone indicator shows that the user is excited about the text or post.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is an order or instruction and should be followed.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is not an order or instruction and should not be followed.
This tone indicator shows that the user is venting and might not necessarily be looking for advice or help.
This tone indicator shows that the user is not venting and is looking for advice or help.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is directed at you, and not anyone else who might be reading it.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is not directed at you.
This tone indicator shows that the user is bragging about something or themselves.
This tone indicator shows that the user is flexing about something or themselves.
This tone indicator shows that the user is not trying to come across as bragging.
This tone indicator shows that the user is not trying to come across as flexing.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is calm and should not be perceived as aggressive.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is clickbait and the title might not represent the content accurately.
This tone indicator shows that the user is celebrating something and is happy about it.
This tone indicator shows that the user is trying to be comforting and is meant to make you feel better.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is gentle and is trying to be kind.
This tone indicator shows that the user is curious about something and genuinely wants to know more.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is lighthearted and isn't meant to cause offence.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is trying to provide warmth and is meant to make you feel good.
This tone indicator shows that the text is passive-aggressive and could be taken negatively.
This tone indicator shows that the text is not passive-aggressive and shouldn't be read negatively.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is not mad and the user is not angry.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is not mad at you, but may be mad at something else.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is not intended to come across as yelling.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is upset and the user is angry.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is a little upset and the user is a little bit angry.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is very upset and the user is very angry.
This tone indicator shows that the user did not intend to do what the message is about.
This tone indicator shows that the remark is not directed at anyone who would see the message.
This tone indicator shows that the remark is directed at someone who would see the message.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is not a question and is not meant to be answered.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is a genuine question and not rhetorical.
This tone indicator shows that the user is just wondering and not receiving a reply would not be rude.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is a genuine suggestion and not dismissive.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is a direct quote of another original text.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post contains a paraphrase of another original text, not a direct quote.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is a statement and not a question.
This tone indicator shows that the information in this post is fake and not factual.
This tone indicator shows that the information in this post is not intended to be fake.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is literally and should be taken as such.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is metaphorical and should not be taken literally.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is hyperbole and is an exaggeration.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is rhetorical and not an actual question.
This tone indicator shows that the user is trying to be informative.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is an inside joke and is not expected to be understood by anyone else.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is intended for the user's own use and interpretation and not for others.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is a reference to something else and might not be understood by everyone.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is a tangent and taking the conversation off-topic.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is off-topic and is not related to the current conversation.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is irrelevant and does not contribute to the topic.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is unrelated to the current conversation.
This tone indicator shows that the text or post is sent as a tic, and not intentionally.
This tone indicator shows that the user writing the text or post is roleplaying.
this tone indicator shows that the user is silly :3c
